No corporate accounts/advertising, no accounts made solely for promotion
No CSAM or any kind of content sexualizing minors
No anti-vaccination rhetoric or harmful and disproved conspiracy theories
No promotion of cryptocurrency or related projects (web3, NFTs, etc)
